import { useState } from 'react' import './styles.css' const api = { key: `b7dea0749e34131fab7f854992d8b946`, base: `https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/` } export default function App() { const [search, setSearch] = useState('') const searchPressed = () => { fetch(`${api.base}weather?q=${search}&units=imperial&APPID=${api.key}`) .then(response=>response.json()) .then(result=>{ setWeather(result) }) } return( <>
